name: Logan Sargeant
introduction: Logan Hunter Sargeant (born 31 December 2000) is a American racing driver who will be competing for Williams in 2023. He was moderately successful in FIA Formula Two[1], winning the 2022 British Formula Two Grand Prix and coming fourth in the Formula 2 Driver's Championship, earning Rookie of the Year. In October 2021, on the weekend of the United States Grand Prix, Sargeant was announced to be joining the Williams Driver Acedemy.[2]
